summary: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.
cast: Roger Miller|Peter Ustinov|Terry-Thomas|Brian Bedford|Monica Evans|Phil Harris|Andy Devine|Carole Shelley|Pat Buttram|George Lindsey|Ken Curtis|Candy Candido|John Fiedler|Dana Laurita|Barbara Luddy|J. Pat O'Malley|Richie Sanders|Billy Whitaker|Dori Whitaker
title: Robin Hood
